## RemirrorThemeColorModes.modes property

Nested color modes can provide overrides when used in conjunction with `Theme.initialColorMode and `<!-- -->useColorMode()<!-- -->\`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
modes?: Record<string, RemirrorThemeColorMode>;
```
